title: My mac client just closes
body: Within the first 5-10 minutes of every game, my client will just close and I'll have to press the reconnect button. It's on the new Mac OS, High Sierra 10.13, I've never had any issue, but at this point, the games just unplayable. I give up 1-2 free kills everygame due to this and I don't know why. I've tried deleting, reinstalling, restarting, everything. Anyone know what could be the cause of this?

replies.body: I've been experiencing the same thing since last patch. I went through the Riot Support loop and they pretty much told me it's my fault for upgrading to the most recent OS and to fix it I have to revert back to the old OS.... fkn ridiculous if you ask me! It doesn't happen to me every single game but it happens a few times a day for me. Very annoying. Sets me super far back if it happens more than once. It always happens in the first 5-10minutes when farming and being in lane is actually important. A company like Riot that supports Mac should be able to support the most recent OS! I've steered clear of ranked games because it's not worth the risk. sigh

Same with me.  Not a network or ISP issue.  Everything else keeps running.  It's a client issue with the new mac OS.

Getting d/c'd in the middle of the fight and getting killed sucks, sorry.  :(  Your issue sounds connection related, your network might be struggling to communicate with the game server.  Stick to custom games for the time being, and use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to work on fixing this up.

Hi Porocles,

It happens in the first 5 minutes so it's usually in laning/not in fights. I also have Fios 1 GB speeds so I really don't think it's a connection issue. Also all of the common symptoms on the link put are none of what I'm experiencing. Please help!

Hey there, when you have a chance run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on the impacted game so we can get a better overview of your situation.  Let me know what you find and we'll go from there.
